title: Pbe
body: Could I get a pbe account at least now, I'm waiting for last summer for one

replies.body: dude, I wait for 3 years now and the signups sind now for 4 months or so down, it will take some time

At the moment, PBE signups are currently closed for maintenance. I don't yet have an exact date on when they'll open back up, but you can be sure to know by checking the [**PBE Status Page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) as well as our [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news).
